content: Though they appear in the same arena, the Shigandang is a much harder challenge compared to the Stone Vanguard. Because of this, it’s recommended that you save challenging this foe until you’re almost complete with Chapter 2 and have a good set of gear and medicines at your disposal to increase damage negation. He’s worth defeating before you fight the final boss of this chapter, as you’ll be able to craft a new weapon upon his defeat.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Shigandang.md", within the section "Shigandang" and the sub-section "Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide". The content is presented below:

Though they appear in the same arena, the Shigandang is a much harder challenge compared to the Stone Vanguard. Because of this, it’s recommended that you save challenging this foe until you’re almost complete with Chapter 2 and have a good set of gear and medicines at your disposal to increase damage negation. He’s worth defeating before you fight the final boss of this chapter, as you’ll be able to craft a new weapon upon his defeat.
